comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: Number of refrigerators to sell
- y: Number of stoves to sell

Definitions:
- x: Integer representing the number of refrigerators to sell
- y: Integer representing the number of stoves to sell

Constraints:
- 60x + 45y \leq 20000 (mover time constraint)
- 20x + 25y \leq 13000 (setup time constraint)

Objective:
- Maximize profit: 400x + 260y

Non-negativity constraint:
- x, y \geq 0
